programme.desc: Aditya finds himself in a fix as he faces some serious allegations in court. Later, Aditya finds out that Malini has stopped the divorce proceedings. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai
programme.desc: Akshara tries to apologise to Dadaji about the sweets but he refuses to listen. Later, Naitik and Akshara confront the shop owner about the stale sweets. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai
programme.desc: Akshara gets upset as the sweets she sent for Nandini turn out to be stale; Varsha pretends to be unwell and leaves the house. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai

programme.title: Divya Drishti
programme.desc: Drishti offers sindoor to Rakshit and tries to remind him about his past. Meanwhile, Pishachini tortures the Shergills by casting a spell to make them look old and haggard. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Divya Drishti
programme.desc: Pishachini lines up the Shergills on the terrace and asks them to jump. But Divya and Drishti arrive in time and save them, making Pishachini cry out in frustration. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Divya Drishti
programme.desc: Divya and Drishti destroy Pishachini's tree as she prepares to make the poisonous lassi. Later, they attack Pishachini, catching her unawares but Rakshit intervenes and saves her. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Anupamaa
programme.desc: Anuj makes a delighted Anupamaa an equal partner in his new business. Later, when Vanraj makes lewd accusations about Anuj and Anupamaa's friendship, she lashes out at him. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Anupamaa
programme.desc: A cunning Vanraj forces Anupamaa to reject Anuj's business proposal. However, when Anupamaa refuses, Baa makes a shocking demand. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Anupamaa
programme.desc: Anupamaa makes a firm decision to accept Anuj's business proposal. Later, Vanraj and Baa are left baffled by Anupamaa's decision. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Anupamaa
programme.desc: When Anupamaa decides to accept Anuj's offer, Vanraj warns her. However, a determined Anupamaa gives him a befitting reply. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai
programme.desc: Akshara gets stage fright and refuses to play Sita's role in the play; Naitik tells Akshara that they will find a new girl to play Sita. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Saath Nibhaana Saathiya
programme.desc: Cousins Gopi and Rashi get married into the same family irrespective of their mutual differences. Gopi's mother-in-law, the apparently strict Kokila, then transforms her into a woman of substance. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Chikoo Ki Mummy Durr Kei
programme.desc: An infuriated Nupur is reluctant to accept that Chikoo is no more. Chikoo, on the other hand, wishes to meet her long-lost mother and question her. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin
programme.desc: When Sai's health deteriorates, Virat promptly rushes her to the hospital. Later, while Virat offers to donate blood, things get out of control. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai
programme.desc: Kartik tries to overcome the sudden demise of his wife, Naira. However, things take an unanticipated turn when he meets Naira's lookalike, Sirat. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: Pearl Harbor
programme.desc: Childhood friends Rafe and Danny become army pilots and meet Evelyn, a navy nurse. However, the three of them later find themselves in the middle of the attack on Pearl Harbour during World War II. (Film - War)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Fantastic Four: Rise Of The Silver Surfer
programme.desc: Comic book adventure follows Fantastic Four superheroes Reed (Ioan Gruffudd), Sue (Jessica Alba), Johnny (Chris Evans) and Ben (Michael Chiklis) as they battle the enigmatic Silver Surfer (Doug Jones), who travels the earth preparing it for total destruction. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Mufasa, the noble lion king of the Pride Lands of Africa, is killed trying to save his young son from a trap set by his evil brother Scar. He then declares himself king and tries to kill Simba. However, Simba escapes and grows up in the company of outcasts Timon and Pumbaa, a meerkat and warthog. Years later, Simba has a chance encounter with Nala the lioness who urges him to return to the pride and take his rightful place as the king. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Incredibles 2
programme.desc: When Elastigirl is called by Devtech to work on a project to change the public's perception towards superheroes, Mr Incredible is left in charge of the household. But looking after Dash, who is having trouble at school, Violet, who becomes withdrawn after her break-up, and baby Jack-Jack's ever-increasing array of abilities is a daunting task in itself. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Percy Jackson: Sea Of Monsters
programme.desc: Percy Jackson, the son of Posedion, decides to uphold Thalia's sacrifice. Thalia had sacrificed herself to get the others into her camp and her father Zeus found another way for her to live by transforming her into a pine tree, creating a magical border around the camp so that no other half-blood would suffer from a fate as she did. For this, he embarks on a journey, with his friends Annabeth, Clarisse and half-brother, Tyson, to the Sea of Monsters to find the Golden Fleece which has the power to save their home and training ground, Camp Half-Blood. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Fast & Furious 8
programme.desc: Dominic's crew is forced to fight against their own leader when a mysterious woman seduces Dominic into betraying them and committing massive acts of cyberterrorism. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: After being fired from the Anti-Villain League, Gru sets out to meet his long-lost twin, Dru, for the first time. But he is soon forced to team up with his brother to take down Balthazar Bratt, a former child star, whose obsession with his 80s character turns him into a supervillain. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Dragonball: Evolution
programme.desc: (Film - Action)

programme.title: John Wick: Chapter 3 - Parabellum
programme.desc: John Wick is excommunicated after killing a crime lord and a hefty bounty is set on him. In order to save himself, John sets out to find an influential but reclusive man. Meanwhile, Winston and the Bowery King have to face the consequences of helping John kill the crime lord. (Film - Action)

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Bobby Hayes and his aide Nick Walker, who work as detectives for the Boston Police Department, steal gold while they are on duty. Bobby kills Nick so that he doesn't return the booty to the officials during a raid. In the afterlife, Nick is hired by Mildred Proctor, the director of Rest In Peace Department (R.I.P.D.), a group of deceased police officers. Nick is assigned the responsibility to fight against the renegade ghosts. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Toy Story 3
programme.desc: Director Lee Unkrich's long time association with Pixar comes handy as he directs the Academy-award winning third instalment in the 3D computer animated comedy trilogy 'Toy Story'. With an ensemble cast consisting of actors like Tom Hanks and Tim Allen rendering their celebrated voiceovers, this visually appetising and emotionally enchanting animation takes viewers in the mysterious world of anthropomorphic toys Woody, Buzz and the gang, who find themselves in the company of untamed, uncivilised tots. Woody and Buzz must plan their great escape with the help of their newly found friends. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Cirque Du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant
programme.desc: During a freak show, two youngsters find themselves in a difficult situation when the ringmaster turns out to be a vampire. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: Vlad the Impaler, a Transylvanian prince, is raised by the Turkish Empire to be an elite Janissary in the Sultan's special force. Having massacred thousands, Vlad's guilty conscience forces him to return to his kingdom. During one of his trips in the forest, Vlad and his soldiers enter an abandoned cave where they are attacked by a monster. Vlad escapes from the cave, into the sunlight, and the creature doesn't follow. On his return to the kingdom he is visited by Turkish emissaries who demand a tribute of 1000 boys who would be trained to become Janissaries like Vlad. Unwilling to fulfil the demand, Vlad meets the Turkish Sultan and offers himself against the boys but is rejected. With no other option left, Vlad turns to the devilish creature he had met before in the forest for help. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Flubber

programme.title: Zootopia

programme.title: The Little Mermaid

When she meets Prince Eric, she falls in love with him and resolves to find a way to be with him. In the process, she ends up striking a dangerous deal with Ursula, a sea witch. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: G-Force
programme.desc: This action adventure movie is directed by Hoyt Yeatman and Hoyt Yeatman IV. The tale of four hamsters on a dangerous mission, led by a brown hamster, Darwin voiced by Sam Rockwell. His team members include Mooch, Juarez and Speckles, all of whom bring a little bit of madness to the mission. The prolific Nicholas Cage lends his voice to play Speckles, while comedians Tracy Morgan and Dee Bradley Baker voice Juarez and Mooch respectively. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Barfi!
programme.desc: Barfi, India's official entry as the best foreign film at the 85th Academy Awards, narrates the story of the eponymous character and his relationships with Shruti and Jhilmil. Set in the 1970s in scenic Darjeeling, the story talks of Barfi's failed attempts at winning Shruti and kidnapping Jhilmil, an autistic heiress to a fortune. Barfi develops feelings for Jhilmil and moves with her to Kolkata. Shruti is unhappily married to Ranjit, and a chance meeting with Barfi rekindles their feelings. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Apaharan

programme.title: Johnny Gaddaar
programme.desc: Seshadri (Dharmendra) gets an offer to make a fortune in four days. He teams up four people who are up for it as this deal will catapult them into the big league. The youngest member of the gang Vikram (Neil Nitin Mukesh) plans to disappear to some unknown city and start his own life with his love Mini (Rimi Sen), when a devilish thought crosses his mind. What if he grabs the entire jackpot? Vikram's opening gambit is a neat double cross. But as he plunges further into his diabolical plan he realizes that the stakes in this game are high. And the only losers he can afford to leave behind are dead ones. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: The Affair
programme.desc: Noah prepares for Descent, an adaptation of his novel, with star Sasha Mann. In the meantime, Helen mourns a tragic event. (TV Show - Drama)
After treating a couple that survived a fire, Hen learns that the husband has suddenly passed away. Meanwhile, Buck decides to help a retired firefighter achieve his goals. (TV Show - Drama)

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: The Saviors visit the Hilltop unexpectedly, surprising everyone, with plans of taking more than supplies. (TV Show - Horror)

programme.title: R.I.P.D.
programme.desc: Bobby Hayes and his aide Nick Walker, who work as detectives for the Boston Police Department, steal gold while they are on duty. Bobby kills Nick so that he doesn't return the booty to the officials during a raid. In the afterlife, Nick is hired by Mildred Proctor, the director of Rest In Peace Department (R.I.P.D.), a group of deceased police officers. Nick is assigned the responsibility to fight against the renegade ghosts. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
programme.desc: As Steve Rogers battles to accept his role in the modern globe, he joins forces with another super soldier, the Black Widow, to fight against a fresh peril, a killer known as the Winter Soldier. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Movie In Focus
programme.desc: A compilation of snippets of movies and behind-the-scene moments of films where the cast and crew share their on-set experiences. (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: Chinese Zodiac
programme.desc: With the twelve ancient animal signs in the Chinese Zodiac stolen, Asian Hawk, a mercenary, sets out to retrieve them. He is accompanied by a Chinese student and a Parisian lady in his mission. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Underwater
programme.desc: Norah, a mechanical engineer, and her team must deal with an earthquake while they are working at the bottom of the Mariana Trench. While they try their best to get out of the ordeal, they discover that a few creatures belonging to an unidentified species are out to get them. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Shrek
programme.desc: In a faraway swamp, in solitude, lives the green ogre 'Shrek', brought to life by the iconic Mike Myers. His lonely existence is infested with fairytale characters, sent there by the evil Lord Farquaad, who wants him to rescue his beautiful bride-to-be, Princess Fiona (Cameron Diaz) and thus, he sets out with Donkey, voiced by the unmatchable Eddie Murphy, to wage a war against a fire-breathing dragon and rescue the princess. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: Set in an alternate universe where both dinosaurs and humans exist, this animated adventure follows the unlikely friendship between Arlo, an Apatosaurus, and a feral caveboy. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Home Alone 3
programme.desc: Eight-year-old Alex fends off thieves who are trying to acquire a top-secret computer chip that they have hidden in his toy car, with which they intend to help a terrorist group. (Film - Adventure)

programme.title: War For The Planet Of The Apes
programme.desc: The Alpha Omega, a paramilitary faction, attacks Caesar's clan, killing his wife and the oldest son. Angered, Caeser rallies his army to take revenge from Colonel, the man behind the faction. Battling his own dark instincts, he decides to lead a final confrontation that will determine the future of the planet. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: Director Patrick Read Johnson's adventurous family comedy 'Baby's Day Out' narrates the story of three wannabe kidnappers, Eddie (Joe Mantegna), Norby (Joe Pantoliano) and Veeko (Brian Haley) disguise themselves as photographers, enter a huge mansion and make away with Baby Bink (Adam and Jacob Worton), millionaires Bennington (Matthew Glave) and Laraine (Lara Flynn Boyle) Cotwell's son. But Baby Bink turns out to be more than a hand full for the crooks. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Ratatouille
programme.desc: Remy, a rat, aspires to become a chef, oblivious to the fact that the profession is phobic to rodents. But the ambitious creature partners with garbage boy Linguini and the duo set a fine-dining restaurant in Paris ablaze with their culinary skills. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Pacific Rim: Uprising
programme.desc: Jake Pentecost, who had left his Jaeger training midway, gets a chance to live up to his father's legacy as he teams up with his estranged sister and former co-pilot to stop a new Kaiju threat. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Predator
programme.desc: Dutch and his team are out on a mission to rescue a group of hostages in Central America. There, they discover that they are being targeted by an extraterrestrial warrior. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Tomorrowland
programme.desc: Starring Academy Award winner George Clooney, this sci-fi adventure follows the exploits of Casey, a curious teenager, and Frank, a disengaged former inventor, who embark on a dangerous mission to unravel the secrets of Tomorrowland, an unexplored dimension in time and space. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers stand on opposite sides when world leaders try to interfere with their activities. With the two superhero factions--led by Captain America and Iron Man--pit against each other, are the Avengers doomed. (Film - Action)

programme.title: G-Force
programme.desc: This action adventure movie is directed by Hoyt Yeatman and Hoyt Yeatman IV. The tale of four hamsters on a dangerous mission, led by a brown hamster, Darwin voiced by Sam Rockwell. His team members include Mooch, Juarez and Speckles, all of whom bring a little bit of madness to the mission. The prolific Nicholas Cage lends his voice to play Speckles, while comedians Tracy Morgan and Dee Bradley Baker voice Juarez and Mooch respectively. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Guardians Of The Galaxy
programme.desc: Peter Quill, kidnapped from the earth by space pirates while he was still a child, escapes from the planet Morag, carrying with him a mysterious yet valuable orb and, as a result, is followed closely by the assassin of Ronan the Accuser who wants it for himself. Quill knows that he cannot take on Ronan alone in a battle in space, so he decides to put together a team of brave and heroic individuals with superpowers, calling them the Guardians of the Galaxy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: (TV Show - Entertainment)

programme.title: No Good Deed
programme.desc: (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: Shanghai Knights
programme.desc: Jackie Chan and Owen Wilson reprise their roles as Chon and Roy and head to London to take revenge on the Chinese rebel who killed Chon's father. But during their pursuit, they stumble upon a dangerous conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Flubber
programme.desc: Robin Williams plays the absent-minded Professor Phillip Brainard in this fun-filled film that looks at the adventures that follow after he creates a rubber-like bouncy substance, Flubber, which helps object fly. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Aladdin
programme.desc: Aladdin, a kind-hearted street urchin, falls in love at the first sight of Princess Jasmine, the princess of Agrabah. When he stumbles upon a magic lamp, Aladdin uses the powers of the magical Genie to make himself a wealthy prince so that he can marry the princess. On the other hand, danger is lurking around Agrabah in the form of an evil sorcerer, Jafar. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins dons the role of a sophisticated CIA agent who tries to transform a street punk (Chris Rock) into a savvy spy after the death of his twin brother. They must together save their city from terrorists. (Film - Thriller)

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: Winning the 77th Academy award for the Best Animated feature, the film directed by Brad Bird, revolves around a family of superheroes who are forced to hide their superpowers and lead mundane lives due to several lawsuits filed against them. Although, Mr. Incredible's desire to help people drags the whole family into a battle with the evil Syndrome who has been responsible for murdering countless retired superheroes. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Lucy in the Sky
programme.desc: Lucy Cola, an astronaut, returns to Earth from her first space mission and begins to feel disconnected from normal life. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Upgrade
programme.desc: After he is paralysed and his wife is killed in a brutal attack, Grey Trace, a technophobe, is approached by Eron, a billionaire, to implant an AI chip in his body to help him become mobile. This artificial intelligence called STEM bestows Grey with heightened senses and abilities and leads him to avenge the death of his wife. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: TRON: Legacy
programme.desc: Based on a story written by Hollywood's renowned Adam Horowitz, Walt Disney Pictures releases 'Tron: Legacy', a sequel to the 1982 cult film 'Tron', which created a buzz among video game geeks as well as movie buffs, that depicts the adventurous journey of Sam, son of a video game developer who mysteriously disappeared 20 years ago, as he is sucked into a virtual reality called the Grid, created by his father, with a mission to stop a corrupted programme from invading the human world. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: Air Force One
programme.desc: The legendary Harrison Ford dons the role of the president of the United States of America, who journeys to Russia and speaks out against terrorism, in this action-packed film directed by the talented Wolfgang Petersen. Trepidation sets in when his family and he are taken as hostages while aboard the 'Air Force One' by those who are out to incite global terror forcing the President to rise to the occasion and combat the crisis at hand. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
programme.desc: As Steve Rogers battles to accept his role in the modern globe, he joins forces with another super soldier, the Black Widow, to fight against a fresh peril, a killer known as the Winter Soldier. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Thing About Harry
programme.desc: Sam, a young gay man, is forced to share a ride with his high school enemy, Harry. However, things soon change between them when Sam learns that Harry is pansexual. (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: Starship Troopers
programme.desc: After successfully completing graduation, Johnny Rico joins a military group and begins his training. Soon, he finds himself battling gigantic alien bug-like creatures who are on a mission to destroy Earth. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Bourne Supremacy
programme.desc: When he is falsely framed in a CIA operation, Jason Bourne is forced to return to his old ways as an assassin, in order to figure out why they are still after him. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Wreck-It Ralph
programme.desc: Ralph is tired of playing the role of a bad guy and embarks on a journey to become a video game hero. But Ralph accidentally lets loose a deadly enemy that threatens the entire arcade. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Thing About Harry
programme.desc: Sam, a young gay man, is forced to share a ride with his high school enemy, Harry. However, things soon change between them when Sam learns that Harry is pansexual. (Film - Tele Film)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: When NASA learns that an enormous asteroid is all set to destroy Earth, it recruits Harry, a deep sea oil driller, and his crew, in order to drill a hole in the asteroid and plant a nuclear bomb in it. In the midst of this, Harry must also deal with his daughter's lover, who is a part of the mission. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: The Jungle Book
programme.desc: Mowgli, a boy raised by wolves, is forced to go to the human village by his friend Bagheera and the animal clan when a man-eating tiger vows to kill him. Along the way, he meets a lazy bear, Baloo, a vicious snake, Kaa, and a smooth-talking ape, King Louie. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Jason Bourne
programme.desc: Jason Bourne's location is revealed to the FBI when he decrypts their files to know more about his past and his father. CIA director Robert Dewey unwillingly authorises Heather Lee, head of the Cyber Ops division, to contact Bourne and bring him back. However, he also secretly sends an assassin in order to execute Bourne. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Lucy in the Sky
programme.desc: Lucy Cola, an astronaut, returns to Earth from her first space mission and begins to feel disconnected from normal life. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: Aaron Cross, an Outcome agent, tries to escape after all those associated with the programme are eliminated. But Outcome operatives use performance-enhancing drugs, which he has run out of, and he must find the biochemist who can help him survive the manhunt. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Lion King
programme.desc: Directed by Roger Allers and Rob Minkoff, 'The Lion King' follows the life of the endearing young lion Simba who is the heir to the throne of his father Mufasa who rules the animal kingdom. But Simba's evil uncle Scar plots to kill him and his father to occupy the throne. The plan succeeds partially with Mufasa being bumped off by Scar. Simba manages to escape and returns to his birthplace on becoming an adult only to see Scar as the ruler. He immediately plots to take over the kingdom with his pals. But wily Scar is no minnow. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: Vin Diesel dons the role of an FBI agent who is allotted the most bizarre assignment of his life in this rib-tickling and enthralling film. Unable to save a brilliant scientist from enemy forces, Vin is tasked with protecting his family, which includes his wife, four children, an infant and a pet duck. Armed with sippers, baby carriers and his guns he must make sure he can don the role of 'The Pacifier' in the tumultuous course of events. (Film - Family)

When she dies of an illness, she leaves behind a dog to help him come to grips with the situation. But when a bunch of men attack John and kill the puppy, he springs back into action and hunts down every man responsible for the act, including his former employer's son. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A man with a bullet-ridden body is found and looked after by strangers. He wakes up to a blank memory and begins a journey to find out his identity. The road ahead is full of danger and conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Undisputed
programme.desc: An action movie that narrates the story of a heavyweight champion called George Iceman Chambers who lands in prison where the resident gangster arranges a boxing match with the reigning prison champion. (Film - Drama)

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend Of The Seven Seas
programme.desc: Superstar Brad Pitt lends his voice to the daredevil adventure-seeker from Middle East, Sinbad the Sailor, who is falsely accused of stealing a legendary magical Book of Peace. To make matters worse, malevolent goddess Eris puts forth a challenge giving Sinbad ten days to find the book or his childhood friend Prince Proteus will take the death penalty on his behalf. Sinbad and Proteus' fiancee Marina set out to face every obstacle that comes their way in order to save their dear Proteus. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: G-Force
programme.desc: This action adventure movie is directed by Hoyt Yeatman and Hoyt Yeatman IV. The tale of four hamsters on a dangerous mission, led by a brown hamster, Darwin voiced by Sam Rockwell. His team members include Mooch, Juarez and Speckles, all of whom bring a little bit of madness to the mission. The prolific Nicholas Cage lends his voice to play Speckles, while comedians Tracy Morgan and Dee Bradley Baker voice Juarez and Mooch respectively. (Film - Fantasy)

programme.title: Captain America: Civil War
programme.desc: The Avengers stand on opposite sides when world leaders try to interfere with their activities. With the two superhero factions--led by Captain America and Iron Man--pit against each other, are the Avengers doomed. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Escape Plan
programme.desc: Starring action stalwarts Sylvester Stallone and Arnold Schwarzenegger, the movie revolves around the exploits of a security system expert who is imprisoned in a high-tech prison and must figure out an ingenious way to escape. (Film - Action)

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: Winning the 77th Academy award for the Best Animated feature, the film directed by Brad Bird, revolves around a family of superheroes who are forced to hide their superpowers and lead mundane lives due to several lawsuits filed against them. Although, Mr. Incredible's desire to help people drags the whole family into a battle with the evil Syndrome who has been responsible for murdering countless retired superheroes. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Flubber
programme.desc: Robin Williams plays the absent-minded Professor Phillip Brainard in this fun-filled film that looks at the adventures that follow after he creates a rubber-like bouncy substance, Flubber, which helps object fly. (Film - Comedy)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: In the year 2020, the world has been ravaged by the dragons that were accidentally awakened from their slumber by humans. Now it is up to Quinn Abercromby (Christian Bale) and Denton Van Zan (Matthew McConaughey) to save mankind from annihilation. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: When the Snow Queen Elsa accidentally puts the kingdom in a state of infinite winter, Anna, her sister, teams up with Kristoff, an iceman, his loyal reindeer and Olaf, a snowman, to convince her to return and reverse the weather. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: An alien race destroys major cities of the world with their advanced weaponry. However, a geek, a pilot, the US President and a group of ragtag survivors unite to save mankind from annihilation. (Film - Sci-fi)

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
programme.desc: A man with a bullet-ridden body is found and looked after by strangers. He wakes up to a blank memory and begins a journey to find out his identity. The road ahead is full of danger and conspiracy. (Film - Action)

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: In the spinoff of 2003 animated adventure movie, 'Finding Nemo', Dory, the forgetful tang fish, remembers her parents in a flashback. She ventures out on a journey to the Jewel of Morro Bay along with Merlin and Nemo. They encounter numerous struggles on the way until a childhood memory guides Dory home. (Film - Animation)

programme.title: Baadshah
programme.desc: K. Jhunjhunwala would like to locate his missing/runaway daughter, Seema Malhotra, so that he can get her married to Nitin Dharampal; Prominent businessman, Mahindra, would like to negotiate with his daughter, Sonu's kidnappers, and secure her release. And the Central Bureau of Investigation would like to protect the life of Chief Minister Gayetri Bachchan under the mission code-named "Maa", and the CBI Officer in Charge to be code-named "Baadshah". Now Baadshah happens to be a bumbling and out of work Private Investigator, who has agreed to assist Jhunjhunwala and Mahindra, and while doing so is mistaken for the CBI Agent, ends up working for the assassins, and must assassinate Gayetri or end up losing his team of four fellow-bumblers, and Mahindra's daughter. What results is hilarious chaos, with no one knowing what the other is doing, and each one being each other's suspect(s). To make matters worse Jhunjhunwala is not really Seema's dad, but someone else with an ulterior motive. (Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Kudrat Ka Kanoon
programme.desc: Dr. Vijay Verma lives in a small town with his wife, Aarti, and a young daughter, Munni. One day Vijay comes to the rescue of a poor laborer, who was being beaten by a group of men working for the town's Sarpanch, Dharamraj. This gets him in the bad books of Dharamraj, and he is subsequently arrested for killing his assistant, found guilty, and sentenced for seven years. Dharamraj then summons Aarti and openly accuses her of having an affair with the deceased assistant, and orders her to be taken out of this town, to the custody of Bombay Police. Years later, Vijay is released from prison, and is anxious to meet his wife and child. When he returns home, he finds that his wife and child are nowhere to be found. Upon inquiring, he learns that his wife was jailed for killing their child, and is now earning a living as a prostitute, and is currently the mistress of Member of Parliament, Charandas.

programme.title: Jab We Met
programme.desc: Depressed after the passing of his father, Dharamraj; as well as his gorgeous girlfriend ditching him, Mumbai-based businessman Aditya Kashyap takes a BEST bus, goes to Chatrapati Shivaji Train Terminus, and boards a train. This is where he meets Geet Kaur Dhillon, who is returning home to Bhatinda, and who pays for his ticket. At Bar Nagar, he decides to leave, but she follows him, missing her train. They manage to get a ride to Ratlam, miss the train again, but eventually make it to Bhatinda. Once there, he gets to meet her family; her pretty sister, Roop; as well as her to-be betrothed, Manjeet Singh Mann. Before the engagement could be finalized, she manages to convince her family that she wants to marry Aditya, and they welcome him with open arms. Before he could take stock of these new developments, she elopes with him - not to get married - but to re-locate to Manali - where her true love, Anshuman, is waiting, and who she hopes to get married to. (Drama,Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Inteha
programme.desc: Tina Saxena lives a wealthy life-style with her widowed businessman dad. One day, all of a sudden, she gets a nasty shock when her dad informs her that he had a mistress before he was married to her mother, and that this affair had resulted in the birth of a daughter, Nandini. Much to Tina's distaste, he invites Nandini to live with them, and asks her to look after Tina after he passes away, as he has been ill for quite sometime. Mr. Saxena does pass away, leaving a grieving Tina and Nandini, with Tina still having nothing to do with her step-sister. Then a dashing young man, Ranbir Oberoi, enters Tina's life and it is love at first sight for them. Nandini also approves of him, and it looks like Tina has given up on her dislike for Nandini. After a few days, and a purse-snatching incident, Nandini counsels Tina that she should consider breaking up with Ranbir. Aghast at this sudden volte face. (Drama,Thriller)

programme.title: Aaj Ka Mahatma
programme.desc: Randhir and Ranvir Verma are twins. Randhir is straightforward, while Ranvir is a petty criminal. These petty thefts add up, and soon the police arrest Ranvir, and he is sentenced to prison. In prison, Ranvir incurs the wrath of a gangster, Tony, and is killed. Randhir undertakes to find the killer, and gets himself arrested, and imprisoned to get to see who the killer is. After getting out from prison, Randhir plans to avenge his brother's death, without knowing that he himself could endanger his very life, as well the life of his girlfriend, Mala. The song "Chandni chand se hoti hai, sitaron se nahin, pyar bhi ek se hota hai hazaron se nahin..." is still popular. (Action,Romance)

programme.title: Aakhri Ghulam
programme.desc: Young Bheema is told by his father, Dinu, that generations of their family have always been slaves to the wealthy Thakurs. When Bheema does not heed this, and not only befriends Sonam, Thakur Daulat Singh's daughter, but also has a physical altercation with Raja Bahadur, Thakur's son, he is publicly whipped. Shortly thereafter his dad passes away after being bitten by a snake. Daulat finds out that Sonam likes Bheema and has her moved to London, and ensures that she forgets him. Subsequently, on her return as an adult she returns home and is told that Bheema is serving 3 years in prison for killing a male named Shamsher Singh. Nevertheless, she renews her friendship with him but will soon find him on the run from the Police - this time for killing a union leader named Kumar. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Daraar
programme.desc: Raj Malhotra lives with his mother, and comes from a very wealthy family. He meets Priya Bhatia, who works with a real estate agency, and instantly falls in love with her. (Thriller,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Eena Meena Deeka
programme.desc: Deeka (Vinod Khanna) had been in jail for several crimes, including bank robberies. When his prison sentence is over, Deeka decides to go straight. Unfortunately, while in a bank, he becomes a victim of a bungling bank robber, Inder or Eena (Rishi Kapoor), who needs money to get medical treatment for his mother (Dina Pathak). When the police arrive, they witness Eena with the notorious bank robber, and come to the conclusion that Deeka has gone back to his criminal ways. Deeka's attempts to convince them are in vain, and he must escape together with Eena for now, and he does so. The police are after Deeka, and he must get a hold of Eena and get him to confess to his crime, and therefore clear his name. But Eena is unwilling to confess, and runs away from Deeka. With the police on his tail, will Deeka be able to capture Eena, and will he be successful in getting him to agree to confess? (Action,Comedy,Crime)

programme.title: Dilwale
programme.desc: The Police Commissioner, Advocate Sinha and Police Inspector Vikram Singh arrive at the Central Mental Hospital to speak with an inmate, Arun Saxena. They hope to get Vikram to befriend Arun so that they could unravel the mystery as to why Arun ended up romancing wealthy Sapna, then getting involved with Jyoti, and subsequently killing her. Arun is arrested, confesses to the the homicide and is sentenced to be hanged. This news unsettles Arun to such an extend that he becomes mentally unstable and is institutionalized. Vikram hopes to befriend Arun, get him cured and medically discharged, and ensure that he is hanged. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Ghayal Once Again
programme.desc: Ajay Mehra (from previous Ghayal-1990), after finishing off his life sentence, starts a newspaper called Satyakam. Still dealing with the haunting trauma of losing his loved ones, Ajay manages to make a credible name for himself in investigative journalism. Working with a strange team of RTI activists, ex-criminals and ilk; and even stranger ways of unearthing and presenting truth, Ajay Mehra has earned quite a fan following among the youths, who finds his fearless and unforgiving approach in dealing with all kinds of sociopaths very inspiring. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Zeher A Love Story
programme.desc: Siddharth, a police officer who is soon to be divorced, has an affair with Anna. However, when she is found dead, he realises he got more than he bargained for. (Thriller)

programme.title: Teri Kasam
programme.desc: A spoiled rich girl falls for a poor aspiring musician. But after they marry, their egos and respective stubbornness cause them to drift apart. (Romance)

programme.title: Shaadi Karke Phas Gaya Yaar
programme.desc: Ayaan lives a very wealthy lifestyle with his married brother, Karan and his wife, Anju; a younger sister, Yamini, and brother, Rahul; his mom, and grandma; and runs a garage. One day he meets with beautiful model, Ahana, and falls head over heels in love with her. She forgets her personal diary at his garage, and through this Ayaan woos, wins her heart, and both get married. Ahana soon finds out that despite of Ayaan's wealth, his family is very conservative and tradition-bound. This causes some bitterness between the newly-weds, which gets worse when she becomes pregnant and wants to abort the child. While visiting her mom on their dog's birthday, Ahana has an accident which results in a miscarriage. Ayaan blames her for losing the child, but his mother convinces him and he apologizes. Few months later, Ahana becomes pregnant again, and that's when she finds out that Ayaan had pulled wool over her eyes through her personal diary... (Romance)

programme.title: Kismat
programme.desc:
A policeman’s son begins to work with criminals. Can his life be turned around?
Ajay (Govinda) is adopted and brought up by ACP Anand (Suresh Oberoi) and his biological mother Geeta (Rakhee), though the parents believe he is actually Anand’s child. Fate intervenes when Ajay begins to work with his real father, Rajan (Kabir Bedi).

programme.title: Pehchaan
programme.desc: A convict by the name of Yogi Shankar is accused of sexual molestation in court. The Judge Jagdish Verma who is responsible for passing Jogi's sentence is well aware of Jogi's behavior as he was once Jogi's defense advocate. With no hesitation Jagdish Verma grant a seven years period of rigorous punishment to Jogi despite his pleadings. The Judge family consists of his wife Urmilla, sons Kunal and Karan Verma; on completion of his seven years sentence Jogi is released from jail and abducts Urmilla, finds out that she is pregnant, ensures that she gives birth to a baby girl Tina and then kills her. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Gaddar
programme.desc: Vijay (Harish) and Sunny (Sunil Shetty) are two friends, who are very close to each other. They study together in college and even fall in love with the same girl, Priya (Sonali Bendre). Sunny is rich and influential, and likes to control and dominate. Vijay comes from a poor family. Sunny wants to control the college scene using Vijay as a puppet, which does not work to Sunny's satisfaction. As a result, Sunny's dad (Mohan Joshi), who owns part of the college, steps in, to assert his and Sunny's position, as well as put pressure on the college authorities, and as well on the other hand, attempts to teach Vijay a lesson for betraying Sunny. But Sunny wants revenge in his own way, and he does so diabolically, by being even more friendly and close to his Vijay and his family. Will Sunny succeed? (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Juaari
programme.desc: Vijay, a young man, resorts to gambling to free his lover, Shanti, whom Sanga holds captive, but he soon runs out of luck and gets arrested. (Family)

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: A cold-blooded contract killer hires the services of a cab driver for a full night. He forces the driver to go around Dubai as he keeps finishing off witnesses scheduled to testify against a gangster.

programme.title: Hote Hote Pyar Ho Gaya
programme.desc: Pinky and Atul alias Bunty are in love with each other, and plan to marry. They, however, run into opposition with their respective families, as their life-partners have already been picked for them. Pinky's dad, a retired Colonel has picked Police Inspector Arjun to be Pinky's groom; while Ajit and Asha, Bunty's dad and mom, have picked Shobha to be Bunty's bride. Both Bunty and Pinky plan to go through with their respective marriages to the partners of their parents' choices, and then eventually divorce them, and then get married to each other. They give in to their parents' choices, and their parents are delighted and both the weddings take place with great pomp and ceremony. Pinky then starts picking fights with Arjun and his mom, and openly insults them; while Bunty also does the same with Shobha. Their plans seem to be going on track, until they come to know that Shobha and Arjun are meeting on the sly. What impact will this have on their plans and their marriage? (Action,Crime,Romance)

programme.title: Keemat
programme.desc: Ajay and Dev are two small-time crooks. One day they accidentally killed a man named Mohan Tripathi. With a good and pleasant mind they find out the address of the decreased and pays a visit to his village. Only to see the young man's family eagerly waiting for his return from abroad, seeing the family's plight they decides to lie about the young man and told the family that he is alive but was delayed because of some urgent work. Days and months passed and Mohan did not showed up towards his family and both young men continues to lie to them. The question remain what will be the outcome of Ajay and Dev when the family learns that there son is no longer alive and that both are his killers? (Action,Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Dhadkan
programme.desc: Dhadkan is about Anjali (Shilpa Shetty) who is a girl that hails from an extremely rich and influential family. Her father Mr. Chauhan (Kiran Kumar) is a renowned businessman and has many dreams for his daughter. But Anjali is in love with Dev (Sunil Shetty) who is very poor & often cannot even afford to clothe himself properly. Dev also loves Anjali, wants to marry her so has to meet her father. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Akele Hum Akele Tum
programme.desc: Rohit and wealthy Kiran Dayal meet each other and fall in love. They intend to marry, but Kiran's parents will not permit her to marry beneath her class. Kiran is adamant, and the marriage goes through without the blessings of the Dayals. They live in harmony for months, even after Kiran gives birth to Sunil. Then they start to have differences, which are minor at present, and then snowball... (Drama)

programme.title: Dilwale
programme.desc: The Police Commissioner, Advocate Sinha and Police Inspector Vikram Singh arrive at the Central Mental Hospital to speak with an inmate, Arun Saxena. They hope to get Vikram to befriend Arun so that they could unravel the mystery as to why Arun ended up romancing wealthy Sapna, then getting involved with Jyoti, and subsequently killing her. Arun is arrested, confesses to the the homicide and is sentenced to be hanged. This news unsettles Arun to such an extend that he becomes mentally unstable and is institutionalized. Vikram hopes to befriend Arun, get him cured and medically discharged, and ensure that he is hanged. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Kalyug
programme.desc: The husband of a woman who commits suicide after a run-in with the adult entertainment industry seeks revenge on those who drove her to her death. In doing so, he delves into the world of international human trafficking, eventually traveling across the world to seek out the ringleaders of this horrifying enterprise. (Thriller)

programme.title: Devta
programme.desc: Film starring Arun Bakshi, Mithun Chakraborty and Mushtaq Khan (Action)

programme.title: 15th August
programme.desc: Nagpal kills Chaudhry and his son, Ram, a military officer. Chaudhry's second son, Vikram, vows to destroy Nagpal who is all set to become the Chief Minister on the upcoming Indian Independence Day.

programme.title: Alibaba Marjinaa
programme.desc: Circa the Mughal rule in Persia, Alibaba lives a poor life-style with his mother; married brother Qasim and his wife. When a princess named Marjinaa is being sold in the slave market, Alibaba wants to buy her and set her free, but he does not have the money. So he borrows some money from Qasim, buys Marjinaa, who offers to live with him as his slave for the rest of her life. Alibaba would like to end slavery, but is unable to do anything as he does not have money. Then one day his mother goes to Qasim to borrow some scales, and it is later that Qasim finds out that Alibaba has come across considerable wealth - enough to buy all the slaves and set them free. Qasim gets more information from Alibaba, so that he can also get wealthy. Qasim does not know that he has just signed away the rest of his life, and put the lives of his wife, mother and brother also in grave danger. (Action,Adventure)

programme.title: Insan
programme.desc: Amjad is a auto-rickshaw driver in Bombay, and lives with his mother in a small tenement in Bombay's slums. His mother had originally given birth to another son, Munna, who has been missing for several years. She is over-joyed when Munna returns home, and both she and Amjad welcome him, and celebrate. They do not know that Munna is now known as Azhar Khan - a member of a Jihaadi terrorist group, who is now using Amjad and his mother as a cover, in order to carry out a deadly and daring terrorist attack. (Drama,War)

programme.title: Qayamat
programme.desc: CBI Officer Akram Sheikh (Sunil Shetty) is on the verge of nabbing three dreaded Pakistan-backed arms dealers , the brothers Ali (Arbaaz Khan) and Abbas (Sanjay Kapoor) and their common moll Laila (Isha Koppikar) . When Sheikh busts an important arms deal conducted by his three targets , Ali-Abbas join forces with Gopal (Chunky Pandey) , a corrupt scientist to get hold of a deadly virus and take the tourists at the Elphinstone Jail resort as hostage . Akram Sheikh is now compelled to get help from Rachit (Ajay Devgan) , a criminal serving jail time who was a former associate of Ali-Abbas and the only person in history to have successfully escaped the Elphinstone jail . Along with a commando team , they try to pull off a rescue attempt by breaking in the jail and rescuing the hostages . (Action,Romance,Thriller)

programme.title: Dhokha
programme.desc: Post-September 11, 2001, Zaid Ahmed Khan lives a wealthy lifestyle in Mumbai and resides in an apartment at Shanti Kutir, Juhu Tara Road, Mumbai, and works as an Assistant Commissioner of Police. One day terrorists strike at a club, killing 20 people, & critically injuring several others. The Police are put on alert, and Zaid is summoned to Police Headquarters to identify a body. To his shock the body turns out to be that of Sarha, his wife - who was not a victim but was a suicide-bomber. While trying to put his life together, Zaid comes across evidence that Sarha may have had an hand in the killings, and thus intrigued he decides to travel to Nasik to find out what really happened, whether his devout Islamic wife was really a terrorist or the victim of a deep-rooted conspiracy. (Drama,Action,Romance,Thriller)

programme.title: Sikka
programme.desc: Two close and very wealthy friends, Vijay and Pranlal, decide to cement their friendship to a relationship when Vijay proposes marriage on behalf of his sister, Shobha, with Pranlal's son, Amar. Pranlal agrees, and preparations are on for the marriage to take place. Vijay finds out that Pranlal and his men are using their business as a front for drugs and smuggling, and he decides to cancel the wedding. Pranlal is angry with Vijay, but refuses to give up his criminal career. When Amar finds out about his dad's spurious activities, he kills himself. Pranlal, humiliated and angered, vows to avenge Amar's death, and wants Shobha to be Amar's widow for the rest of her life, which is not acceptable to Vijay. Then Shobha meets with a handsome stranger named Jackie, who rescues her. She offers him employment with her brother's firm, and they fall in love with each other. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Katilon Ke Kaatil
programme.desc: A weather widow spends her life searching for her two missing sons to bestoy her fortune on. When she finally finds two young men, are they who they seem? (Action,Thriller)

programme.title: Dhaai Akshar Prem Ke
programme.desc: Karan Khanna is an orphan and a captain in the Rajputana Armed Forces. He's madly in love with beautiful model Nisha, with whom he plans to tie the knot during his next leave. On the way to... (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Zamaana Deewana
programme.desc: With crime flourishing out of control, the Assistant Commissioner of Police (ACP) arranges a meeting of senior police officers to discuss this situation. They are apprised that there are two criminal dons involved, namely Madanlal Malhotra, and Suraj Pratap Singh, who are involved in gang rivalry, which is spreading violent crime throughout the city. At the recommendation of the Chief Minister, a criminal psychologist is sent to assist the ACP, namely Kamdev Singh alias KD., who proposes that instead of tackling the two gangs, he will try to get the children of Malhotra and Singh to fall in love, thus ending their traditional rivalry. His attempts to do so only serve to bring the two families apart even more, it is then Kamdev decides on more drastic action, with deadly and hilarious results. (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Jeena Marna Tere Sang
programme.desc: Amar is the son of a millionaire. He decides to avenge on Asha for slapping him in public, but later falls for her. He also discovers the truth about his father. (Romance,Drama,Family)

programme.title: Yeh Hai Mumbai Meri Jaan
programme.desc: Raju comes to Mumbai in search of a job and becomes a peon for a big firm. He soon discovers that certain people are scheming to make the company go bankrupt. (Action,Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Wafadaar
programme.desc: Wafadaar is a 1985 action drama starring Rajnikanth, Padmini Kolhapure and Vijayeta Pandit. Daya Sagar and his wife have brought up their daughter Chanda very well. They don’t approve of her being around Ranga and want her to marry someone else. Ranga is said to be having an affair. A woman who had assisted Daya Sagar’s wife during her pregnancy reveals that he has two daughters, not one! This leads to turmoil in the family.

programme.title: Taqdeer Ka Tamasha
programme.desc: A single mother, Geeta, must deal with her two sons, the elder a Police Inspector Suryapratap; while the younger, Satya, a hoodlum, when both get into conflicts. Things only get worse after Satya gets arrested, arguments ensue and he leaves. He gets hired by Sheshnaag for the sole purpose of exacting vengeance against his rival, Deva. Both brothers are fated to meet again when Suryapratap decides to accumulate evidence to arrest Deva. Neither of the brothers know that Deva has an alias, and is determined to thwart any attempt for revenge nor face any charges under the Indian Penal Code. (Action,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Barsaat
programme.desc: Badal (Bobby Deol) is a naive but intelligent young man who comes from a small village to the big city. He is introduced to city life by Damru (Harish Patel) who now calls himself Danny. When Badal attends college, he meets with pretty and percocious, Tina Oberoi (Twinkle Khanna), and after a few misunderstanding and misadventures... (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Masterji
programme.desc: Percocious village belle, Radha, the daughter of Mukhiya Jamnadas, takes a liking to the widowed school-master, Masterji, the father of a toddler; when he spurns her, she publicly accuses him of having an affair with her and forces him to marry her. She then finds out that he really loves his colleague, Shobha, and becomes embittered towards him. Things get out of hand when he and the villagers start suspecting that she may have been responsible for trying to kill his son. (Comedy,Drama)

programme.title: Mr. Natwarlal
programme.desc: Mr. Natwarlal is a 1979 Hindi Action comedy movie. Produced by Tony Glaad it is directed by Rakesh Kumar. Natwar is just a young boy when his beloved older brother and caretaker, police officer Gridharilal (Ajit), is framed for bribery by sinister criminal mastermind Vikram (Amjad Khan). When he grows up, Natwar (Amitabh Bachchan) creates a secret identity for himself, posing as a powerful and mysterious underworld figure named Mr. Natwarlal, determined to slowly but surely exact vengeance on Vikram. - via Wikipedia ( http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mr._Natwarlal ) (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Tadipaar
programme.desc: Shankar (Mithun Chakraborty) is sentenced to live outside the limits of the city due to a Police case. One day he happens to rescue a woman in distress from some hoodlums and finds out that her name is Namkeen, who resembles a missing multi-millionaire Mohinidevi (Pooja Bhatt). Shankar asks Namkeen to impersonate Mohinidevi to embezzle her wealth. Namkeen agrees to do so, but the question remains: where is Mohinidevi, and what will happen to Namkeen when she is found? (Action,Drama)

programme.title: 16 December
programme.desc: White collar crimes that drain the nation of precious foreign exchange is connected to the funding of international terrorism. The much-told Hollywood theme is retold in the Indian context with much needed technical wizadry. (Action,Thriller)

programme.title: Tilak
programme.desc: A girl turns into a dacoit after her family is killed by rivals. She has a change of heart and gives up her weapons, assumes an alias and falls in love with an inspector. But her past soon catches up. (Action)

programme.title: Main Aisa Hi Hoon
programme.desc: Main Aisa Hi Hoon (English: I Am Like This) is a Bollywood film released in 2005. It was directed by Harry Baweja and stars Ajay Devgan, Sushmita Sen, Esha Deol and Anupam Kher. This film is a remake of the American drama film I Am Sam written and directed by Jessie Nelson, and starring Sean Penn as a father with a developmental disability.[1] (Musical,Drama)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Khatron Ke Khiladi
programme.desc: Honest truck driver Balwant watch helplessly as the owners of the trucking company he works for mauled his brother, Jaswant to death. When he lodges a complaint with the police the inspector instead arrest him for this crime; the trucking company owners then burn his house killing his pregnant wife Sumati. Years later Balwant who now calls himself Karamvir operates a court called 'Teesri Adalat' by sentencing wrong-doers to death in a judge and executer style. However he is unaware that Sumati is still alive and has given birth to twins Rajesh and Mahesh; while Mahesh was separated at birth and grows up with Inspector Ram Avtar and his wife - Rajesh is taking care of his mother as she loses her mental balance in the trauma. Rajesh and Mahesh do get to unite as the girls they are in love with are link to each other. After a few misjudgments of situations at hand Rajesh and Mahesh decides that they will bring Teesri Adalat to the court of law - at any cost. (Action,Drama)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A wide range of products manufactured by popular brands can be bought at attractive prices from the comfort of one's home. (Consumer)

programme.title: Dilwale
programme.desc: The Police Commissioner, Advocate Sinha and Police Inspector Vikram Singh arrive at the Central Mental Hospital to speak with an inmate, Arun Saxena. They hope to get Vikram to befriend Arun so that they could unravel the mystery as to why Arun ended up romancing wealthy Sapna, then getting involved with Jyoti, and subsequently killing her. Arun is arrested, confesses to the the homicide and is sentenced to be hanged. This news unsettles Arun to such an extend that he becomes mentally unstable and is institutionalized. Vikram hopes to befriend Arun, get him cured and medically discharged, and ensure that he is hanged. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Qayamat
programme.desc: CBI Officer Akram Sheikh (Sunil Shetty) is on the verge of nabbing three dreaded Pakistan-backed arms dealers , the brothers Ali (Arbaaz Khan) and Abbas (Sanjay Kapoor) and their common moll Laila (Isha Koppikar) . When Sheikh busts an important arms deal conducted by his three targets , Ali-Abbas join forces with Gopal (Chunky Pandey) , a corrupt scientist to get hold of a deadly virus and take the tourists at the Elphinstone Jail resort as hostage . Akram Sheikh is now compelled to get help from Rachit (Ajay Devgan) , a criminal serving jail time who was a former associate of Ali-Abbas and the only person in history to have successfully escaped the Elphinstone jail . Along with a commando team , they try to pull off a rescue attempt by breaking in the jail and rescuing the hostages . (Action,Romance,Thriller)

programme.title: Diljale
programme.desc: Captain Ranvir is assigned the task of apprehending two terrorists named Shaka and Dara. Upon arrival in the region, he meets with and falls in love with Radhika, the daughter of Rajasaheb, who also is a Mantri. The latter approves of him, and arranges his wedding with his daughter. Before the engagement could take place, Ranvir finds out that he has a rival in Shaka, who was in love with Radhika before, and is all set to prevent this marriage at any and costs. Ranvir decides to postpone his wedding until such time he arrests Shaka and his associates - a decision that will not only pit him against well-armed terrorists, but also result in the abduction of a bus-load of Vaishnodevi devotees - which include Radhika and her Bua. (Action,Drama,Romance)

A few days later Kaali reach with an accident and looses his left arm and he holds Vinay the Engineer responsible for the accident. programme.title: Ustaad
programme.desc: Shamsher Singh, a runaway criminal, pretends to love Asha and gets married to her. However, on the wedding night, Shamsher leaves Asha and never returns. (Drama)

programme.title: Entertainment
programme.desc: Akhil (Akshay Kumar) finds out that he is the heir of 3000 crore rupees as he and his mother were abandoned by his diamond baron father (Panna Laal Johari) who is now dead. However, his life goes Topsy-turvy when he learns that the empire goes to entertainment (a dog). (Comedy)

programme.title: Jaanwar
programme.desc: Sultan (Shakti Kapoor) adopted an orphan and named him Badshah (Akshay Kumar). Badshah grows up to be a criminal and his life was made difficult by Inspector Pradhan (Ashish Vidyarthi). Badshah's sidekick is Abdul (Ashutosh Rana). The only hope in Badshah's life is Sapna (Karisma Kapoor), whom he incidentally met. But circumstances lead Badshah to commit murder in public. During this experience, a child clangs to him and he took the child to Sapna. Before he could explain anything, Pradhan gets there and Badshah had to escape. He changed his name to Babu Lohar and becomes a blacksmith and loving father, to give the child a good future. However, after 7 years, he sees Abdul and Sultan again. Pradhan is still after him. When the child's parents find out about him, they ask Babu to return their child. Will he let the child go? Will the child go with his parents? (Action,Family,Drama)

programme.title: Ek Vivaah... Aisa Bhi
programme.desc: Chandni, a singer from an upper middle-class family, falls in love with Prem. They are unable to marry for many years until Chandni's siblings grow up. (Drama)

programme.title: Lagaan
programme.desc: Lagaan tells the tale of the Indian village Champaner, beset by drought and British colonialism in the year 1893. Without a drop of rain in months, the worried villagers of Champaner decide to ask the local authorities for a temporary repeal of their taxes -- the hated lagaan. Led by the heroic Bhuvan (Indian superstar Aamir Khan) they bring their plight to the military governor, Captain Russell (Paul Blackthorne). But the sadistic Russell threatens to raise the lagaan threefold, unless the villagers can beat his men at a game of cricket, in which case he'll lift taxes on the entire province for a period of three years. Bhuvan accepts the challenge, but there's a problem -- no one in Champaner knows how to play cricket. A band of misfits come to the rescue, coached by Russell's soft-hearted sister Elizabeth (Rachel Shelley), and the race is on to be ready in three months' time. An epic reworking of Victory with eye-popping song-and-dance routines. (Adventure,Drama,Music,Romance)

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Marcus Burnett is a hen-pecked family man. Mike Lowry is a foot-loose and fancy free ladies' man. Both are Miami policemen, and both have 72 hours to reclaim a consignment of drugs stolen from under their station's nose. To complicate matters, in order to get the assistance of the sole witness to a murder, they have to pretend to be each other. (Adventure,Drama,Action,Comedy,Thriller,Crime)

programme.title: Total Siyapaa
programme.desc: Total Siyapaa is an upcoming Hindi romantic comedy film directed by Eshvar Niwas and written by Neeraj Pandey. (Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
programme.desc: From the Egyptian desert to deep below the polar ice caps, the elite G.I. JOE team uses the latest in next-generation spy and military equipment to fight the corrupt arms dealer Destro and the growing threat of the mysterious Cobra organization to prevent them from plunging the world into chaos. (Adventure,Action,Thriller,Science Fiction)

programme.title: Sankat City
programme.desc: Owning several aquariums, fish-loving Mumbai-based Guru makes a living stealing cars, getting them to his garage-owner friend, Ganpat Gajanan Jagirdar, and re-selling them through an associate, Sharafat. One day he steals a Mercedez and takes it to Ganpat. They inspect the car, find a bag containing Rs.1 Crore, decide to keep it and improve their lifestyles. Ganpat 'refurbishes' the vehicle, and Sharafat finds a buyer in Suleman, who quite unfortunately, recognizes it, and informs the owner, Fauzdaar - a ruthless gangster and money-lender. Guru is located, interrogated brutally, and agrees to return the cash which is still stashed in the garage. When he goes there - Ganpat, who had hidden the cash, has met with an accident, is gravely injured, and requires immediate hospitalization. While recuperating, the doctor finds that he has completely lost his memory. With rising fears of a meteor crashing in the city... (Comedy)

programme.title: Golmaal
programme.desc: Gopal, Lucky, Madhav and Laxman - four guys bound together by their child-like notoriety, aimlessness and petty business of conning people for fun and money. Laxman is an intelligent student who is not allowed to pass by his mischievous band of friends Gopal, Madhav and mute Lucky. This is because all four friends use his hostel room to conduct their activities. He is peer-pressured into running a series of scams in order to earn himself and his friends some money. Once thrown out of college bag-n-baggage, the naughty foursome finds refuge in the bungalow of a blind couple as their grandson. A cat mouse game unfolds as Laxman's body and Gopal's voice makes for Sameer (The grandson from US). (Comedy,Family)

programme.title: Hello Charlie
programme.desc: Charlie, a simpleton daydreamer, currently a pizza delivery boy is tasked with driving his uncle's truck , Girnaar Express, to deliver a gorilla from Mumbai to the jetty at Diu. However, Charlie is unaware that Gorilla is disguised business tycoon MD Makwana, who is on the run after committing a multi-crore scam. (Adventure,Comedy)

programme.title: Vivah
programme.desc: Prem and Poonam’s marriage is arranged and they go through the most magical and romantic period of their lives. But just when everything is set for their marriage a crisis puts the love of Prem and Poonam through a trial by fire. 'Vivah' is a heart-warming tale of their unconditional love... (Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Great Grand Masti
programme.desc: Amar, Meet and Prem go into a small town where they encounter a 'femme fatale' in the form of Ragini. Ragini is everything they had dreamed of, but she slowly turns into their worst nightmare! (Comedy)

programme.title: Suriya S3
programme.desc: Durai Singham, an honest and uncompromising DCP, takes on a businessman and his goons who are involved in illegal dumping of toxic waste and causing serious health concerns. (Action)

programme.title: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
programme.desc: Framed for crimes against the country, the G.I. Joe team is terminated by Presidential order. This forces the G.I. Joes into not only fighting their mortal enemy Cobra; they are forced to contend with threats from within the government that jeopardize their very existence. (Adventure,Action,Science Fiction,Thriller)

programme.desc: Movie. (Drama)

programme.title: Sita Ram
programme.desc: Sita is a materialistic woman who only cares about materialistic gains and nothing else. MLA Basava Raju lusts for her and wants her to give him what she promised him for helping her. The villain of their tale is Ram, a man who’s way too innocent for his own good. How does Ram help Sita out of the fix she’s in forms the crux of the story. (Romance)

programme.title: Main Hoon Surya Singham 2
programme.desc: Picking up the storyline from where Singam ended, Duraisingam (Suriya) has gone undercover after meeting the Home Minister and is working as an NCC officer in a school in Thoothukudi. The only people who know about this operation are the Chief Minister and Home Minister apart from himself. (Comedy,Action,Thriller,Crime,Drama)

programme.title: Chanakya
programme.desc: Arjun aka Ramakrishna is a RAW marshall from Delhi who has a 100% success rate at nabbing terrorists. What happens when he makes enemies out of India's most wanted Ibrahim Qureshi and his son Sohail? (Action,Thriller)

programme.title: Edakkad Battalion 06
programme.desc: Shafeek's father wanted him to become a chef, but he chose to serve his country instead. On his annual leave from work, Shafeek, now a young soldier, must deal with his family, his bride to be and a gang involved in illegal activities. (Drama)

programme.title: Dangerous Khiladi
programme.desc: Julayi is the story of a fun loving guy who does not work and has no aim in life. He falls in love with a young girl and the story turns on how his life has to change to win her love. (Romance,Comedy)

programme.title: Blue
programme.desc: Blue is set in the breath taking sun soaked white sand beaches of Bahamas. Sagar is an excellent deep sea diver who dreams of getting his own new boat someday while his friend Aarav is a rich arrogant businessman, whose ego is much larger than the big boats that he owns. The conflict between these two sparring friends is the conflict between the rich & the poor, Moral & Immoral, and greed & honor. (Adventure,Drama,Action,Thriller)

programme.title: Neevevaro
programme.desc: As Kalyan, a blind chef and Vennela, who comes visiting him at his restaurant, fall in love and start making plans for their future, Vennela goes missing. Series of unexpected and shocking events follow. (Thriller,Romance)

programme.title: Lucknow Central
programme.desc: Kishen Mohan Girhotra (Farhan Akhtar) is a young man who belongs to Moradabad, a city in Uttar Pradesh. One fateful day, Kishen gets accused of murder which lands him in Lucknow Central Jail where he’s awaiting his High Court trial for a death penalty. Meanwhile, a diligent NGO worker Gayatri Kashyap (Diana Penty), is compelled to form a Band of Prisoners for the band competition which is to be held in the dreaded jail of ‘Lucknow Central’ that year and this is how Kishen’s and her paths cross. Kishen befriends four other inmates, namely Dikkat Ansari, Victor Chattopahdyay, Purushottam Pandit, Parminder Trehan and convinces them to join the band. (Thriller)

programme.title: Bhoot
programme.desc: Manjeet Khosla lives with her widowed mom in Bombay, India. She gets married, gives birth to a son, and separates from her spouse. She goes to live on the 12th floor of an apartment building. Thereafter, she has an affair with Sanjay Thakkar, who is the son of the building Secretary. Shortly thereafter, she and her son fall down from their balcony and die. The building watchman testifies that Manjeet was depressed and suicidal. (Horror,Thriller)

programme.title: Inspector Vikram
programme.desc: Inspector Vikram is the typical do-gooder cop, who also entertains and ensures no crime is left unsolved. What happens when he gets to meet a villain who is smarter than the average criminal and heads a drug racket? (Action,Romance)

programme.title: Power Unlimited
programme.desc: Ravi Teja plays a young man desperate to become a police officer, who becomes embroiled in a plot to pose as his lookalike in order to re-capture an infamous thug from rogue cops. The film revolves around two similar looking people, Baldev Sahay - a corrupt ACP in Kolkata and Tirupathi - a person aspiring to become a police officer in Hyderabad. The home minister of Kolkata recruits Tirupathi to play as Baldev to catch a gangster rescued by Baldev. Rest of the story is all about why Baldev became a corrupt cop and how Tirupathi executed the unfinished mission of Baldev. (Romance,Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Zombie Reddy
programme.desc: A game developer and his friends head to Kurnool to attend their friend’s wedding. But something much more menacing rather than delicious pelli bhojanam awaits them there. (Horror)

programme.title: A1 Express
programme.desc: The Yanam hockey team is fighting hard to save their stadium from a corrupt Sports Minister. Will they win the match that decides their fate? (Drama,Family)

programme.title: Chennai Express
programme.desc: Rahul embarks on a journey to a small town in Tamil Nadu to fulfill the last wish of his grandfather: to have his ashes immersed in the Holy water of Rameshwaram. En route, he meets a woman hailing from a unique family down South. As they find love through this journey in the exuberant lands of South India, an unanticipated drive awaits them. (Romance,Comedy,Action)

programme.title: Pogaru
programme.desc: Shiva, a ruffian, is the terror of his area in many ways, but still has a heart of gold. He has just one wish, for his mother to love him wholly like the way he does. (Action)

programme.title: Nagashaurya's Aswathama
programme.desc: A man returns to India for his sister's engagement ceremony but discovers that something terrible has happened to her. On his quest for the truth, he uncovers a series of crimes against women. (Action)

programme.title: Aakhri Yudh
programme.desc: Recovery Agent Babji (Aadi) came across a girl, named Kavya (Namitha Pramod) and helped her. He came to know that she was in danger from her family. Babji saves her. Unfortunately Kavya’s brother (Abhimanyu Singh) misunderstood that Babji was behind this and starts chasing the couple. Babji takes Kavya with him to his village and introduces her as his best friend. As time passes Kavya falls in love with Babji, but at the end both Kavya’s family and another gang attacks Babji and his family. The rest of the story shows how Babji handles the issue, solves his problems and ends up marrying Kavya. (Action)

programme.title: Aakhiri Chaal: Ab Kaun Bachega
programme.desc: A bloody power struggle erupts between three brothers who are vying to take over the family business following the death of their father. (Action,Crime,Thriller)

programme.title: Bol
programme.desc: Bol is a roller coaster of emotions, yet carries subtleties that make your heartbeat stop. Based in the heart of Lahore, the story takes place in a house full of daughters, with vibrancy of life, yet restrictions on blooming. It questions the worth of a human being, may it be a woman or a person born with a birth defect. It questions the authority of reproducing human beings into this world without taking responsibility of acknowledging their worth. Bol takes you through a journey into the life of this family experiencing their troubles, sufferings, resolves and high points. As family members take decision to solve their problems they step into deeper troubles. The complexity of their circumstances becomes a struggle of life and death. (Drama,Thriller)

programme.title: Tanu Weds Manu
programme.desc: Marriages are made in heaven! Though the road to heaven might be a little “tedha’. Meet ‘Manu’, a seedha saadha Doctor from London. Intelligent, temperate and from a respectable family, The perfect groom which every parent wants for their daughter. ‘Family pressure’ leads him to Kanpur to meet Tanu the quintessential small town girl who has studied in Delhi. Tanu is a smart, intelligent girl who will do everything that her parents will disapprove. With a mind of her own and a love for rebellion, Tanu is dead against an arranged marriage. But destiny holds something totally different for these dramatically diverse personalities. Their paths keep crossing time and again and weaves this wonderful story through the Indian heartland. (Drama,Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Size Zero
programme.desc: A plus-sized woman battles the owner of a slimming centre. (Comedy,Romance)

programme.title: Mar Mitenge
programme.desc: Tony (NTR) is a wily youngster who does illegal things for money. He falls in love with Niharika (Tamanna) during a freak incident. He keeps following her and proposing to her. But she is engaged to some other rich guy. Tony has a secret mission and he is in hot pursuit of somebody. The rest of the story is all about the love story between the lead pair and how Tony achieved his mission. (Action,Romance)

programme.title: Indian Soldier Never On Holiday
programme.desc: The story revolves around a young Indian Army captain (Vijay) who comes home to Mumbai for his vacations and stumbles upon a network of sleeper cells. How he deduces their identities and plans and how he and his team put an end to their goals forms the rest of the plot. A high octane action thriller with plenty of laughs sprinkled along with chartbuster songs, Thuppakki was the Diwali success of 2012 and the biggest blockbuster of the year in Tamil cinema. (Action)

programme.title: De Dana Dan
programme.desc: Nitin (Akshay Kumar) and Ram (Suniel Shetty) are only lucky in love, otherwise their life is a big zero as is their bank balance. But now their rich girlfriends, Anjali (Katrina Kaif) and Manpreet (Sameera Reddy) have given them an ultimatum – earn enough money so that we can elope or forget us forever. Broke and desperate Nitin and Ram need to make big money and fast. (Action,Comedy)

programme.title: Power Unlimited 2
programme.desc: A businessman devoted to his family decides to take matters into his own hands after his sister witnesses a murder. Soon, secrets involving his past life come to light. (Action)

programme.title: Super Hero Shehenshah
programme.desc: The film opens in Chennai with a crusader television journalist Bharati (Genelia) trying to unravel corruption in high places. The state Home minister is hand in gloves with terrorists who are planning to create tension and planting bombs in Chennai. One day while escaping after a sting operation on city's nefarious activities she gets badly beaten and her two friends killed. At the same time in an accident, the thugs who had brutally bashed her meets with an accident and gets killed. Bharati creates an imaginary character called Velayudham and writes a note that he wants to clean up the city of the bad guys! Written by Captain (Drama,Action)

programme.title: Rowdy Baadshah
programme.desc: Rama Rao (Jr. NTR) is the son of Ranjan (Mukesh Rishi) who works as an assistant to Mafia Don Saadu Bhai (Kelly Dorji) is an IPS Aspirant. However, he is rejected from police work due to his fathers connections to the criminal underworld. Meanwhile his brother Siddu (Siddarth Narayan) gets killed in a bomb blast planned by Saadu Bhai. Rama Rao seeking revenge, reunites with his father and becomes Baadshah on the advice of a police officer (Sayaji Shinde). He decides to save India and also completes Operation Baadshah. So he approaches Janaki and falls in love with her. He enters as Ramji a Wedding planner in Janaki's house. He cleverly fools Padmanabha Simha (Brahmanandam) with "Dream Machine" concept and uses him to collect information about Saadu Bhai. Meanwhile Saadu kidnaps police officer (Sayaji Shinde) and threatens to kill him, Baadshah comes to the location Kills Aadi, Saadu Bhai and Crazy Robert and marries Janaki. (Action,Drama,Romance)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: A politician slips into a coma after getting attacked by criminals. He wakes up after several years to find his son has taken up his responsibilities. However, things are not what they seem to be. (Action)

programme.title: Hari Puttar: A Comedy Of Terrors
programme.desc: Inadvertently left at home by adults, young cousins face-off against burglars. (Comedy,Family)
